text: ihonhan yeoseong-eun samgaewol-eul gidalige doenani ineun hananim-i tae naee changjohan geos-eul sumgineun geos-eul maggoja ham-ila man-il geudeul-i hananim gwa naeseleul mid-eo nampyeon-i dol-a-eul uisaga iss-eul ttaeneun nampyeon-eun i gigan-edol-a-eul gwonliga iss-eumyeo ttohan yeoseong gwa namseong-i ttoggat-eun gwonliga iss-euna namseong-i yeoseongboda wie issnani ha nanim-eun mansahyeongtong hasim-ila
